entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
